q1: Has Nigeria ever reached the semi finals of the FIFA World Cup?
a1: No, they have been a frequent participant in recent world cups but never perform to well.
q3: Do they have the skill to progress further in the next World Cup?
a3: They must improve that is all, not only up front, but as a team in general
q4: Who is the Nigeria goal keeper?
a4: Francis Odinaka Uzoho is the keeper
q5: Does Francis Odinaka Uzoho have many international caps for Nigeria?
